channel.title: SolarScape New [317] Rsps (!JOIN TODAY!)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/CKa4ZCO.gif[/img][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/ArV9BNC.gif[/img]
[SIZE=4]SolarScape is a community driven private server where the fun never ends. There are tons of activities to keep you busy and lots of rewards for being part of our server! This is no ordinary RSPS, this is a server run by the players and their interests. Our goal is to keep the adventureres of SolarScape satisfied. See you in game![/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]
\/\/Home Page\/\/ [url=http://solarscapersps.com/]SolarScape Home Page[/url]
Auto Vote Rewards! Auto Donations!
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7BkK3zn.gif[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i58V68R.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jNZ5aCG.gif[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PQYzcJJ.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QWQGrxe.gif[/img][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LNxdH3e.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://imgur.com/cZz5qdD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://imgur.com/avZBlTy.png[/img]
- Dedicated staff keeping tabs on updates and players 24/7
- Daily rewards for voters
- Seasonal events
:In Game:
- Fully working godwars
- All Chaotics
- All Nex sets
- All new items added
- All working skills
- Friendly and helpful players
- Barrows minigame
- Perfect hybrid switching
- Regulated economy
- Personable staff
- Fully equipped starting zone
- Special skilling zones
- Updated daily
- Fully functional Corp
- Slayer with great rewards
- Reduced prayer point loss
- Custom game modes
- Donator zones and perks
- Daily login perks
- All PvP zones available
- Fully functional Jad
- PvP and PvM Highscores
[/SIZE]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZswKK7e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Srfzc5j.png[/img][/CENTER]
